import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import './Cards.css'; import CardItem from './CardItem'; function CatagorizedCards() { const womenClothes = useRef(null) const babiesClothes = useRef(null) const gotoWomenSection = () => window.scrollTo({ top: womenClothes.current.offsetTop, behavior:"smooth" }) const gotoBabiesSection = () => window.scrollTo({ top: babiesClothes.current.offsetTop, behavior:"smooth" }) return ( <>

); } export default CatagorizedCards;
